acceptedColor.title: Accepted underline color
acceptedColor.description: We'll underline the words we understand in this color.

background.title: Background color
background.description: Adjust the background color for the question field.

commitButtonBackgroundColor.title: Submit button background color
commitButtonBackgroundColor.description: Select a color for the background of the submit button.

errorColor.title: Error underline color
errorColor.description: We'll underline the words we don't understand in this color.

hoverColor.title: Hover color
hoverColor.description: Adjust the color used to highlight different options in the question field dropdown menu.

questionFontColor.title: Question font color
questionFontColor.description: Adjust the font color for the text within the question field.

questionFontFamily.title: Question font family
questionFontFamily.description: Adjust the font family for the text within the question field.

questionFontSize.title: Question font size
questionFontSize.description: Adjust the font size for the text within the question field.

restatementFontColor.title: Restatement font color
restatementFontColor.description: Adjust the font color for the text below the question field that restates what you've entered. This text only appears if you enter something we don't understand.

restatementFontFamily.title: Restatement font family
restatementFontFamily.description: Adjust the font family for the text below the question field that restates what you've entered. This text only appears if you enter something we don't understand.

restatementFontSize.title: Restatement font size
restatementFontSize.description: Adjust the font size for the text below the question field that restates what you've entered. This text only appears if you enter something we don't understand.

warningColor.title: Warning underline color
warningColor.description: We'll underline the words we're not sure about in this color.

cardBackground.title: Card background color
cardBackground.description: Adjust the background color of the suggestion cards.

cardFontColor.title: Card font color
cardFontColor.description: Adjust the font color for the text within the suggestion cards.

cardFontFamily.title: Card font family
cardFontFamily.description: Adjust the font family for the text within the suggestion cards.

cardFontSize.title: Card font size
cardFontSize.description: Adjust the font size for the text within the suggestion cards.

headerFontColor.title: Header font color
headerFontColor.description: Adjust the font color for the suggestions header.

headerFontFamily.title: Header font family
headerFontFamily.description: Adjust the font family for the suggestions header.

headerFontSize.title: Header font size
headerFontSize.description: Adjust the font size for the suggestions header.
